title: Enterprise CRM Redesign
description: Overhauling a legacy CRM system to improve sales team productivity and customer insights

caseStudy.challenge: Sales teams struggled with a cluttered interface, leading to low adoption rates and missed opportunities. The system lacked modern features and had poor mobile support.
caseStudy.solution: Conducted extensive user research with 50+ sales professionals, created a unified design system, and implemented a progressive disclosure pattern to reduce cognitive load.
caseStudy.impact: Reduced task completion time by 35%, increased daily active users by 40%, and improved customer satisfaction scores from 3.2 to 4.7/5.

testimonial.quote: The new CRM has transformed how our team works. Tasks that took 10 minutes now take 3.
testimonial.author: Sarah Johnson

title: FinTech SaaS Dashboard
description: Building an intuitive dashboard for financial analytics and automated reporting

caseStudy.challenge: Complex financial data needed to be presented in a way that was accessible to non-technical users while maintaining depth for power users.
caseStudy.solution: Designed a progressive complexity system with smart defaults, customizable widgets, and AI-powered insights that surface automatically.
caseStudy.impact: User base grew 125% in 6 months, engagement increased 3.2x, and customer-reported productivity improved by 60%.

testimonial.quote: This dashboard gives us insights we never knew we needed. It's become essential to our workflow.
testimonial.author: Michael Chen

title: E-commerce Landing Page
description: High-converting landing page design that increased conversions by 180%

caseStudy.challenge: The original landing page had a 2.1% conversion rate and high bounce rate. Users weren't understanding the value proposition quickly enough.
caseStudy.solution: Implemented F-pattern layout with clear hero section, social proof above the fold, and strategically placed CTAs based on scroll depth analysis.
caseStudy.impact: Conversion rate jumped from 2.1% to 5.9%, bounce rate decreased by 45%, and average order value increased by 32%.

testimonial.quote: The redesign paid for itself in the first week. Our revenue has tripled since launch.
testimonial.author: Emily Rodriguez

title: Healthcare Patient Portal
description: HIPAA-compliant patient portal focusing on accessibility and ease of use

caseStudy.challenge: Patients, especially elderly users, found the existing portal confusing and inaccessible. WCAG compliance was minimal.
caseStudy.solution: Conducted usability testing with diverse age groups, implemented WCAG 2.1 AAA standards, and created clear information hierarchy.
caseStudy.impact: Accessibility score reached 98/100, patient satisfaction increased to 4.8/5, and support tickets decreased by 67%.

testimonial.quote: Finally, a healthcare portal my parents can actually use. The impact on patient engagement has been remarkable.
testimonial.author: Dr. James Wilson

title: AI Productivity Assistant
description: AI-powered task management and productivity platform with natural language interface

caseStudy.challenge: Users felt overwhelmed by traditional task managers. Natural language AI needed to feel intuitive, not gimmicky.
caseStudy.solution: Designed a conversational interface that learns user preferences, with smart task breakdowns and context-aware suggestions.
caseStudy.impact: Task completion rates increased 55%, retention hit 89%, and DAU grew 2.8x in 3 months.

testimonial.quote: It's like having a personal assistant who knows exactly what I need before I do.
testimonial.author: Lisa Zhang

title: Real Estate Marketplace
description: Modern property listing platform with immersive 3D tours and AR features

caseStudy.challenge: Property listings looked dated and didn't showcase spaces effectively. Mobile experience was poor.
caseStudy.solution: Integrated 3D virtual tours, AR room visualization, and optimized mobile-first search with intelligent filters.
caseStudy.impact: Lead generation increased 210%, average time on site jumped 145%, mobile conversions up 95%.

testimonial.quote: Our clients love the virtual tours. We're closing deals 40% faster than before.
testimonial.author: Robert Martinez
